title: Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale

twitter_posts.content: NEW RELEASE! Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale is here! A action_horror_mashup you won't put down.
"Some stories change you forever." - Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale
Readers, what's your favorite action_horror_mashup trope?

instagram_posts.content:
It's here.

Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale is officially OUT NOW.

The white whale isn't just a whale—it's a kaiju. Captain Ahab assembles a crew of monster hunters with harpoon cannons and steam-powered armor to take down the beast...

Link in bio!

tiktok_scripts.hook: POV: You just finished Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale
tiktok_scripts.script: And you're emotionally destroyed in the best way possible...

facebook_posts.content:
I'm so excited to share this with you!

Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale is now available!

The white whale isn't just a whale—it's a kaiju. Captain Ahab assembles a crew of monster hunters with harpoon cannons and steam-powered armor to take down the beast

I hope this story finds the readers who need it.
